law.catch_line: Availability Of Benefits To Persons Recognized As A Spouse Under Laws Of The Commonwealth
law.text: Notwithstanding the unavailability of federal financial participation, no person who is recognized as a spouse under the laws of the commonwealth shall be denied benefits that are otherwise available under this chapter due to the provisions of 1 U.S.C. ยง 7 or any other federal non-recognition of spouses of the same sex.
